experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.description:
• Designed and developed a tailored Human Resources Information System (HRIS) for Colainord, aimed at digitalizing and centralizing administrative processes and leave management.
• Analyzed existing manual processes and identified key inefficiencies, including lack of traceability, time loss, and high error rates in leave management procedures.
• Implemented core features such as:
 - Online submission and validation workflow for leave requests
 - Real-time leave balance tracking with automated calculations
 - Secure centralized employee records and contract management
 - Digitalized intern and contract tracking with alert systems
 - Automated generation of reports and official documents (e.g., leave summaries, internship certificates)
• Led full-cycle development, including requirement analysis, data modeling (MCD/MPD), UX/UI design, front-end and back-end implementation, testing, and deployment.
• Enhanced operational efficiency by streamlining HR workflows, improving data accessibility, and reducing administrative workload.
• Strengthened decision-making capabilities by enabling reliable, real-time access to employee data and HR metrics.
• Contributed to Colainord’s digital transformation strategy, aligning HR operations with the organization's growth and modernization goals.
• Designed and developed a tailored Human Resources Information System (HRIS) for Colainord, aimed at digitalizing and centralizing administrative processes and leave management. • Analyzed existing manual processes and identified key inefficiencies, including lack of traceability, time loss, and high error rates in leave management procedures. • Implemented core features such as: - Online submission and validation workflow for leave requests - Real-time leave balance tracking with automated calculations - Secure centralized employee records and contract management - Digitalized intern and contract tracking with alert systems - Automated generation of reports and official documents (e.g., leave summaries, internship certificates) • Led full-cycle development, including requirement analysis, data modeling (MCD/MPD), UX/UI design, front-end and back-end implementation, testing, and deployment. • Enhanced operational efficiency by streamlining HR workflows, improving data accessibility, and reducing administrative workload. • Strengthened decision-making capabilities by enabling reliable, real-time access to employee data and HR metrics. • Contributed to Colainord’s digital transformation strategy, aligning HR operations with the organization's growth and modernization goals.

experiences.title: ADAS software development engineer
experiences.description:

experiences.description:
Study, design and simulation of an electronic panel for the presetting of three-phase meters:
using a forward-type DC-DC converter instead of electromechanical consoles (which are bulkier and lack precision) and for this we carry out a set of test benches using a standard meter of reference(which is already preset)

The objectives of the project is to :
-Increase the accuracy of electrical energy measurement at the level of three-phase meters 
-Invest with the lowest possible cost.
-reduce clutter and save space.

profile.name: Ismail Ouahbi
profile.about:
AI & Generative AI Engineer | Data Science

With over 3 years of experience in AI, Data Science, and Business Intelligence, I specialize in building and deploying scalable AI solutions that drive business impact. My expertise includes:

🔹Machine Learning & AI: NLP, Computer Vision, and Predictive Analytics

🔹MLOps & Deployment: Azure Databricks, and Cloud AI solutions

🔹Business Intelligence: Power BI, SQL, and Tableau for Data Visualization

🔹Automation & Optimization: Building robust ETL pipelines and AI-powered tools

Key Achievements & Highlights

🔹Improved decision-making at Ciments du Maroc through a real-time BI solution

🔹Developed an AI-driven meal recognition app (86% accuracy) using CNN & MobileNetV2

🔹Built AI-powered text summarization and OCR tools for document processing

Hosted and Presented:

🔹“Generative AI & Data Science” webinar at FST Marrakech

🔹“Explore the World of Data!” session for GDG Marrakech

🔹2-Day Digital Training on Data Science and AI with the Youth Space Foundation

I’m passionate about helping businesses leverage AI to innovate and grow. I also share my knowledge through workshops, blogs, and mentoring, aiming to expand AI literacy and best practices within the tech community.

Let’s connect and discuss AI-driven solutions!

experiences.description:
I have conducted several projects including:

- Achieved an accuracy of 86% through a project aiming at searching for a convenient meal based on detected ingredients through your phone camera by building a smart mobile application using Flutter and TensorFlow Lite (Deep learning, CNN, MobileNetV2) using a training data set with over 49 items each one with over 1000 images.

- Data analysis.
-Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA): Conducted EDA to gain valuable insights
from the dataset, revealing hidden patterns and informing subsequent data
processing steps.

- Data cleaning using Excel and Python
- Manual and Automated Cleaning: Employed both manual and automated data
cleaning techniques, initially using Excel to address inconsistencies and later
performing data type checks and conversions within a Python script.
- Multivariate Imputation: Employed advanced imputation techniques such as the IterativeImputer to handle columns with significant missing values, enhancing the dataset's accuracy
and integrity.

experiences.title: Business Intelligence Data Warehouse Consultant
experiences.company: Ciments du Maroc - HeidelbergCement Group · Internship
experiences.description:
Designing and implementing a robust decision-making solution for optimizing general management operations:

My precise work was to build a decision-making solution for the General Management of Ciments du Maroc, especially the sales and control department.
I started with the analysis of the current state, followed by a self-training on the technologies I need to carry out the project well(Tableau software, Excel, Python Libraries, SQL Server DBMS, SSIS).
Then I proceeded to implement the decision-making system which begins with data gathering and some demonstration dashboards followed by designing a robust ETL pipeline using SSIS powering a data warehouse represented by a SqlServerDB that feeds Tableau software for reporting. 
The final step involves building dashboards using Tableau Software to better understand the company's data and make the right decisions after a set of analysis.
Designing and implementing a robust decision-making solution for optimizing general management operations: My precise work was to build a decision-making solution for the General Management of Ciments du Maroc, especially the sales and control department. I started with the analysis of the current state, followed by a self-training on the technologies I need to carry out the project well(Tableau software, Excel, Python Libraries, SQL Server DBMS, SSIS). Then I proceeded to implement the decision-making system which begins with data gathering and some demonstration dashboards followed by designing a robust ETL pipeline using SSIS powering a data warehouse represented by a SqlServerDB that feeds Tableau software for reporting. The final step involves building dashboards using Tableau Software to better understand the company's data and make the right decisions after a set of analysis.

experiences.description:
Our project delivers high-quality statistics of companies` E-reputation in order to help them improve their business and quality of work because a company's reputation can bring a lot of opportunities and collaborations to it.
We've developed a web app backed by AI especially NLP applications for text mining.
We've scraped data from an online newspaper in order to analyze the sentences.
Our main goal was to come up with a lot of information & data about each company presented within our website & thus making our platform more sophisticated.
This project was presented during the ceremony of projects within our faculty and we've been classed 3rd.
